[E032] Error: cannot declare `readonly` property `Foo\Bar\Baz::$foo` as 'static'
   ,-[code.php:6:22]
   |
 6 |      public readonly static string $foo;
   *             ^^^^|^^^ ^^^|^^        ^^|^  
   *                 |       |            `--- property `$foo` is declared here
   *                 |       |                
   *                 `------------------------ property is declared as `readonly` here
   *                         |                
   *                         `---------------- try removing this
---'
